title: Pirates of the Caribbean
description: This dashboard uses the TMDB API to retrieve detailed movies data, including the movie name, date, rating, catagory, and top crew using Vanilla JS. The dashboard has search feature that all muthed movies with thumbnails for easy access.

title: MadLibz
description: MaDreamLibs for Kids is a phrasal template word game that consists of one player prompting others for a list of words to substitute for blanks in a story before reading. The concept is to help the dreams of kids come true.

title: PebbleWork
description: PebbleWork is a platform that enables both organizations and individuals to organize or join events in which they are interested and more...
